Eye Guard is the perfect Chrome Extension for anyone looking to reduce eye strain and fatigue while browsing the web. By replacing bright white backgrounds with a soothing, customizable color, Eye Guard provides a more comfortable and enjoyable browsing experience.

Why Choose Eye Guard?

Long hours of screen time can lead to discomfort, especially on websites with glaring white backgrounds. Eye Guard helps protect your eyes by creating a softer, more natural viewing experience.
